channel.title: Jsfiddle on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Jsfiddle on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Javascript Equality Operator Grids
item.description: Javascript gets some bad press these days especially over how its comparison operators work. I decided to extend Craig Gidneys example and added ===, !=, !== <, <=, > and .= comparisons. Rows are the left side operand and columns are the right. Source code on jsfiddle
